ExternalServiceRegistration.description: Post operation to get access token
ExternalServiceRegistration.label: PostParadigmAccessToken
ExternalServiceRegistration.schema: {"openapi":"3.0.1","info":{"title":"PostParadigmAccessToken","description":"Post operation to get access token"},"paths":{"/api/authenticate":{"post":{"description":"Post request to get Access Token from Paradigm QA","operationId":"Get Access Token","requestBody":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"password":{"type":"string"},"username":{"type":"string"}}}}},"required":true},"responses":{"2XX":{"description":"","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"expiration":{"type":"string","format":"date-time"},"accessToken":{"type":"string"}}}}}}}}}}}
